Advisory: Pyjwt 1.0.0 includes a fix for security vulnerability where 'alg=None' header could bypass signature verification (https://github.com/jpadilla/pyjwt/pull/109) and adding support for a whitelist of allowed 'alg' values 'jwt.decode(algorithms=[])' (https://github.com/jpadilla/pyjwt/pull/110).
